q: Kirsten Gillibrand described the moment when Gabrielle Giffords opened her eyes-- referenced in Barack Obama 's memorial speech that evening-- with Minority Leader Nancy Pelosi ( D-Calif.) and Nancy Pelosi Debbie Wasserman Schultz ( D-Fla.) in the room. It literally was the will of her husband, Mark Kelly, drawing her out and coaxing her to open her eyes, Kirsten Gillibrand said. "It was all about her courage and her strength," she said. Mike Pence shuts 1 door, leaves another open U.S. Rep. Mike Pence shut the door Thursday on seeking the presidency in 2012 but left unanswered whether his choice instead is the Indiana governor's office. I'm open to running for governor, Mike Pence said in an exclusive interview with The Indianapolis Star. "We're going to take the next several months to travel across the state and hear what Hoosiers have to say. We'll seriously consider it.

: Starting April 4, co-founder Larry Page, becomes CEO and takes over day-to-day operations. Co-founder Sergey Brin will focus on strategic projects, specifically, new products. Eric Schmidt becomes Executive Chairman and will focus externally on deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships, government outreach and technology thought leadership-all of which are increasingly important given Google's global reach. Internally, Eric Schmidt will continue to act as an advisor to Larry and Sergey Brin . In a statement, Eric Schmidt said: "We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed
